name: since-app-start
description: Get time passed since nodejs app start. Similar to performance.now() in browsers.

0.1.0.name: since-app-start
0.1.0.description: Get time passed since nodejs app start. Similar to performance.now() in browsers.

readme:
# since-app-start

Get time passed since you've started node.js process.

## Usage

```javascript
// 1. Set global.appStartTime before you load any node.js modules.
global.appStartTime = Date.now()

// 2. The following line would return a prepared for output string.
require('since-app-start').addEntry('Loaded modules')
```
